issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Add method to CsvExec to get CSV schema
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11440](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11440). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It is not possible to inspect an already created CsvExec and determine what the underlying schema is

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11440?focusedCommentId=17276349) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9377
